HOME.TITLE: CasinoCoin Token Wallet
HOME.IMPORT-KEY-SECRET: Please provide the Secret for the account you want to import. The funds belonging to the account for the given secret will be moved to the main account in this wallet.
HOME.IMPORT-KEY-EXISTING: Import to existing account in this wallet (recovery possible)
HOME.IMPORT-KEY-ADD: Add account for secret to this wallet (recovery NOT possible!)
HOME.INDICATIONS: Please select the account you want to sign the message with. Then enter the message to sign and the wallet password. Using the generated Public Key and Signature your signed message can be verified.
HOME.MSG-INST: Please enter the message, public key and signature you want to verify

SETUP.TITLE: CasinoCoin Token Wallet
SETUP.STEP1-TITLE: Welcome to the CasinoCoin Token Wallet setup
SETUP.STEP2-SUBTITLE: Before the wallet setup can continue, you must accept the following disclaimer:
SETUP.STEP2-ACCEPT: I have read, understand and accept the disclaimer.
SETUP.STEP3-INTRO-TEXT: Please enter your email address and a wallet password. Keep your password in a safe place, without it your wallet can not be opened or used anymore!
SETUP.STEP3-REQUIREMENT: Your password needs to contain letters and numbers and be a minimum of 8 characters long. Your email address must be a real valid email address.
SETUP.STEP4-SUBTITLE: In case you lose access to your wallet or your password, it can be recovered using the Recovery Passphrase and the Email Address you used creating the wallet. Please write down the shown words in the exact order as they appear, together with your email address on a piece of paper or otherwise and keep it safe.
SETUP.STEP4-RECOVERY-ACCEPT: I have saved the wallet recovery phrase and the email address, or i understand the consequences of not doing so.
SETUP.STEP41-WORDS-NOT-EQUAL: The requested words are not the same

TOKENLIST.TITLE: Account List
TOKENLIST.ACTIVATE-CSC: Please send a minimal amount of {{accountReserve}} CSC to your account to activate it.
TOKENLIST.FUND-CSC-TO-ACTIVATE: Please fund your CSC account to have a minimum of 2 times the account reserve of {{accountReserve}} CSC to activate a new token account.
TOKENLIST.SELECT-NEW-TOKEN: Select the new token to add to the wallet
TOKENLIST.ADD-NEW-CSC-PASSWORD: Please supply your current wallet password
TOKENLIST.SELECT-CSC-ACCOUNT: Select the CasinoCoin account to add the token to:
TOKENLIST.NOT-ENOUGH-CSC: Not enough CSC to create a transaction.

PAPERWALLET.TITLE: Paper Wallet Generator
PAPERWALLET.EXPLAIN: A CasinoCoin Paper Wallet is an offline mechanism for storing CasinoCoin and Tokens. The process involves printing the public and private keys onto paper.
PAPERWALLET.DISCLAIMER-TEXT: Use of the CasinoCoin Paper Wallet Generator is offered solely to persons who are at least 18 years old. Your use of the Paper Wallet Generator is solely at your own risk, and you hereby agree to release CasinoCoin and its affiliates from any and all claims arising out of or in connection with your use of the Paper Wallet Generator or your Paper Wallet, including risk of loss of the Paper Wallet key(s) and any other damages whatsoever.
PAPERWALLET.INSTRUCTIONS-TEXT:
Step 1. Generate New Address

Click on the "Generate Keys" button.

Step 2. Print the Paper Wallet

Print the page using the high quality setting. Never save the page as a PDF file to print it later since a file is more likely to be hacked than a piece of paper.

Step 3. Share your public address

Use your public address to receive CasinoCoin from other users. You can share your public address as much as you want.

Step 4. Keep your private key secret

The private key is literally the keys to your coins. If someone were to obtain it, they could withdraw the funds currently in the wallet, and any funds that might be deposited in that wallet.

Please test sending a small amount before receiving any large payments. You can check the balance of your wallet using your public address here: https://explorer.casinocoin.org or here https://csc.observer

SUPPORT.REF-GIT: Report an error or bug on the
SUPPORT.REF-FAQ2: on the website. The answer may already be there
SUPPORT.EMA-RE2: and a support agent will get back to you
SUPPORT.REF-REEDIT: Join our official subreddit and post your question,
SUPPORT.BITC-TLK: Share your comments and ideas on whats latest @casinocoin,
